argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ax-addf | |- + : ( CC X. CC ) --> CC |
| 2 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( + : ( CC X. CC ) --> CC -> + Fn ( CC X. CC ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cnfldadd | |- + = ( +g ` CCfld ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +f ` CCfld ) = ( +f ` CCfld ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_plusfeq | |- ( + Fn ( CC X. CC ) -> ( +f ` CCfld ) = + ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 6 | #P_mp2b | |- ( +f ` CCfld ) = + |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eqcomi | |- + = ( +f ` CCfld ) |
